title: Federico Colombo
text:
Federico Colombo (born 6 December 1987) is an Italian professional <a href="golf">golf</a>er who plays on the <a href="European%20Tour">European Tour</a>.
Career.
Colombo won several junior amateur events in his home country, before taking up a golf scholarship to the <a href="University%20of%20Arkansas">University of Arkansas</a> in 2007. He spent a year in Arkansas, but turned professional in late 2008 having reached the final stage of <a href="qualifying%20school">qualifying school</a> for the <a href="European%20Tour">European Tour</a>. Playing the final stage as his first professional tournament, Colombo finished T29th and earned a place on the <a href="European%20Tour">European Tour</a> for 2009. After a slow start, making only one cut, Colombo concentrated on the second-tier <a href="Challenge%20Tour">Challenge Tour</a>, and subsequently played full-time at that level for two further seasons, with a best result of T2nd in the 2010 <a href="Kazakhstan%20Open">Kazakhstan Open</a>. In 2011, he recorded eight top ten finishes in 20 events to finish seventh in the rankings and secure a return to the European Tour.
Team appearances.
Amateur
